title: Vintage Comic Book Heroes
description: From the Golden Age to the Silver Age, how well do you remember the comic book heroes that thrilled readers at the newsstand?

questions.question: Superman first appeared in 1938 in which comic book?
Batman made his debut in 1939. What was the name of his alter ego?
Wonder Woman was created by William Moulton Marston, who also invented what real-world device?
Captain America first appeared in 1941 punching which real-world figure on the cover?
What was the name of Superman's home planet?
The Flash, Green Lantern, and other heroes were revived in the late 1950s, launching what era of comics?
Spider-Man first appeared in 1962 in which Marvel comic?
What was the typical price of a comic book in the 1950s?
The Comics Code Authority seal, which appeared on comic book covers starting in 1954, was created in response to what?
options: Public concern about comic book content corrupting youth

questions.question: Which superhero team, created by Stan Lee and Jack Kirby in 1961, was Marvel's first family of superheroes?
What was Captain Marvel's magic word that transformed young Billy Batson into a superhero?
The Green Lantern's power ring was famously ineffective against what color?
Which comic book publisher created Superman, Batman, and Wonder Woman?
What was the name of the teenage hero who was also known as Robin, Batman's sidekick?
Which 1966 TV series, starring Adam West, brought Batman to a new audience with its campy, colorful style?
